common_1130_system_01:
Do you want to press the button to disable one
of the locks on the Zero Lab?
common_1130_system_02: You know what you need to do... Better press it!
common_1130_hakase_01a: Ah, ah, ɑh. Hel|ｏ. Can you hear me now?[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1130_hakase_01b: Ah, ah, ɑh. Hel|ｏ. Can you hear me now?[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1130_hakase_02a:
Pｌｅaｓe fｆffvfｏｒgｉｖe mｙ previous transmission.
There seems to be some signal interference.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1130_hakase_02b:
Pｌｅaｓe fｆffvfｏｒgｉｖe mｙ previous transmission.
There seems to be some signal interference.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1130_hakase_05a:
The locks have all been disabled at last.
Please make your way now to the Zero Lab—\r
which lies at the very bottom of Area Zero.[VAR 0114(000B)]

The locks have all been disabled at last.
Please make your way now to the Zero Lab—\r
